Package com.vserdiuk.casestudy.messaging

Class OrderExpirationProducer

java.lang.Object
com.vserdiuk.casestudy.messaging.OrderExpirationProducer
@Component public class OrderExpirationProducer extends Object
A Spring component responsible for producing order expiration events to a Kafka topic. This class schedules and processes order expiration tasks, sending events for expired orders to a Kafka topic and updating the task status accordingly.

  • Method Details

    • scheduleExpiration

      public void scheduleExpiration(Long orderId, long delayMinutes)
      Schedules an order expiration task for a given order ID with a specified delay. Creates a new OrderExpirationTask with a pending status and saves it to the repository.
      Parameters:
      orderId - the ID of the order to schedule for expiration
      delayMinutes - the delay in minutes before the order expires

    • processExpiredTasks

      @Scheduled(fixedRate=60000L) public void processExpiredTasks()
      Periodically processes pending order expiration tasks that have reached their expiration time. Runs every minute to check for tasks with a status of TaskStatus.PENDING and an expiration time before the current time. Sends expiration events to the Kafka topic and updates the task status to TaskStatus.SENT or TaskStatus.FAILED based on the outcome of the Kafka send operation.
